data.lyric:
[ti:Everything I Need (《海王》电影片尾曲)]
[ar:Skylar Grey]
[al:Aquaman (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Everything I Need (Film Version) - Skylar Grey
[00:00.97]Lyrics by：Skylar Grey/Elliot Taylor
[00:01.95]Born on the wrong side of the ocean
[00:08.20]With all the tides against you
[00:14.51]You never thought you'd be much good for anyone
[00:20.88]But that's so far from the truth
[00:25.71]I know there's pain in your heart
[00:29.46]And you're covered in scars
[00:33.32]Wish you could see what I do
[00:38.36]'Cause baby everything you are
[00:43.86]Is everything I need
[00:47.08]You're everything to me
[00:51.41]Baby every single part
[00:56.67]Is who you're meant to be
[00:59.91]'Cause you were meant for me
[01:02.88]And you're everything I need
[01:11.79]You can say I'm wrong
[01:14.26]You can turn your back against me
[01:18.53]But I am here to stay
[01:21.96]I am here to stay
[01:24.97]Like the sea
[01:27.24]She keeps kissing the shoreline
[01:30.35]
[01:31.25]No matter how many times he pushes her away
[01:35.88]'Cause baby everything you are
[01:41.53]Is everything I need
[01:44.63]You're everything to me
[01:48.99]Baby every single part
[01:54.25]Is who you're meant to be
[01:57.39]'Cause you were meant for me
[02:01.92]And everything happens for a reason
[02:09.11]It's all a blessing in disguise
[02:15.52]I used to question who I was
[02:20.75]Well now I see
[02:23.87]The answer is in your eyes
[02:27.28]'Cause baby everything you are
[02:31.75]
[02:32.66]Is everything I need
[02:35.80]You're everything to me
[02:40.19]Baby every single part
[02:45.46]Is who you're meant to be
[02:48.56]'Cause you were meant for me
[02:51.68]And you're everything I need
data.trans:
[ti:Everything I Need]
[ar:Skylar Grey]
[al:Aquaman (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.97]//
[00:01.95]生在浩瀚汪洋的彼岸
[00:08.20]汹涌潮汐朝你涌来
[00:14.51]你从不认为自己能帮到谁
[00:20.88]但事实绝非如此
[00:25.71]我清楚你心底承受的伤痛
[00:29.46]你遍体鳞伤
[00:33.32]希望你能看到我的努力
[00:38.36]因为宝贝 无论你是谁
[00:43.86]你都是我渴望的一切
[00:47.08]你就是我的全部
[00:51.41]亲爱的 关于爱的每个剧情
[00:56.67]都早已命中注定
[00:59.91]因为你是我的命定之人
[01:02.88]你是我渴望的唯一
[01:11.79]你可以说我痴人说梦
[01:14.26]你可以转过头去不予理睬
[01:18.53]但我会在原地等待
[01:21.96]留在原地等待
[01:24.97]如同大海
[01:27.24]时刻不离不弃的亲吻着海滩
[01:30.35]
[01:31.25]不管海岸将它推开多少次
[01:35.88]因为宝贝 无论你是谁
[01:41.53]你都是我渴望的一切
[01:44.63]你就是我的全部
[01:48.99]亲爱的 关于爱的每个剧情
[01:54.25]都早已命中注定
[01:57.39]因为你是我的命定之人
[02:01.92]万事皆有因果
[02:09.11]塞翁失马焉知非福
[02:15.52]我过去常常问自己是谁
[02:20.75]现在 我明白了
[02:23.87]答案就藏在你眼里
[02:27.28]因为宝贝 无论你是谁
[02:31.75]
[02:32.66]你都是我渴望的一切
[02:35.80]你就是我的全部
[02:40.19]亲爱的 关于爱的每个剧情
[02:45.46]都早已命中注定
[02:48.56]因为你是我的命定之人
[02:51.68]你是我渴望的唯一
